title: FOR EVERyone
tags: 2013 2014 AY compo Compowinner Demo Forever Invitation Speccy video ZXSpectrum
info:
Song created for 8bit computer party Forever 14 (Slovakia, Trenčín).
This party is dedicated computers Atari, Commodore, ZX Spectrum and Amstrad CPC.
Music was created in Vortex Tracker on Win7.
I thank all sceners for their voices !!!
Forever and 8bits rulezZz 4ever !!!!!
